headline: UBS Lifts Analog Devices (ADI) Target, Keeps Buy Rating
summary: Analog Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ:ADI) is included among the 15 Best Blue-Chip Stocks with Growing Dividends. On December 8, UBS analyst Timothy Arcuri raised his price target on Analog Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ:ADI) to $320 from $280, keeping a Buy rating on the shares. In its fiscal Q4 2025 report, Analog Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ:ADI) showed solid growth. […]

headline: Earnings Estimates Moving Higher for Analog Devices (ADI): Time to Buy?
summary: Analog Devices (ADI) shares have started gaining and might continue moving higher in the near term, as indicated by solid earnings estimate revisions.

headline: Top 6 chip stocks to buy for 2026, according to this semiconductor analyst
summary: Investing.com -- In a note to clients on Tuesday, Bank of America analyst Vivek Arya named six large-cap stocks he believes are best positioned to outperform as spending on AI infrastructure accelerates.
